name: PAX East 2013 Pack C

black_cards.text: I don't know exactly how I got the PAX plague, but I suspect it had something to do with ____.

white_cards: Wil Wheaton crashing an actual spaceship.
Smashing all the pottery in a Pottery Barn in search of rupees.
Forgetting to eat, and consequently dying.
Judging elves by the color of their skin and not by the content of their character.
